name: Catalyst
description: Catalyst is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body color, inspired by the iconic rossoCorsa shade, Catalyst stands out among its robotic peers. Its unique design combines the agility of a cat's limbs with the precision of soldier-themed buttons. The red and black screen adds a touch of sophistication to its appearance, making it an eye-catching member of the WebtrES club.
